description:
Kanata`s mission today is to go to town to get supplies. She takes her shopping list and Noel drives her into town in a jeep. Everything`s new and fresh to her, but Noel gives her answers to all her questions. Even Noel has a problem she can`t solve, however...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Niebo podczas deszczowej pogody: Kryształowa tęcza
Tsuyu no Sora - Hari no Niji
